info.name: KB API - Sandbox - Direct access to account
info.description:
More info about service https://www.kb.cz/en/kb-api/kb-api-services/direct-access-to-account

General info www.kb.cz/api

header.description:
Correlation ID (GUID 128-bit: 8-4-4-4-12) is the generated unique identifier of the initial request, which stays the same through all the systems/application involved.

This value is automatically generated for every request. To use user-defined correlation ID, replace variable {{v4uuid}} with actual value.
Qualified certificate for digital signature. This header is automatically filled from TLS handshake.

query.description: Start date of returned transaction history (YYYY-MM-DD).
End date of returned transaction history (YYYY-MM-DD).
Current transaction history page. Page starts with 0 (first page).
Number of transactions per page. Default value is 10 transactions per page.

variable.description: IBAN represented as unique ID, which is returned from resource account-ids.

request.description: Returns transaction history based on input parameters. Sorting is based on transaction date, from older to newer transactions.
